Package main.java.questfortheabodeth.characters

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.questfortheabodeth.characters.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collidable, org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player
    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable, Collidable
    An abstract class to define all the common attributes that both the main.java.questfortheabodeth.characters and all monsters will have
